name: Abhilash Sankaramanchi
position: Product Builder | Founding Team at Anaglyph | ex- Meta

current_company.name: Stealth AI Startup
current_company.title: Product Builder | Founding Team at Anaglyph | ex- Meta

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: Exploring GenAI use cases and building something new.
experience.description_html: Exploring GenAI use cases and building something new. <!---->

experience.title: Founding Team, Lead
experience.description: As one of the early team members at Anaglyph, I assumed multiple roles as a Generalist, working closely with the founders. We aimed to simplify the intricacies of DeFi, so we built Brew Money, a self-custody DeFi wallet that helped our users earn higher yields on their crypto assets with interest credited every second.I drove product-led growth and experimented on various insights we received through our user research which resulted in over 10% week-over-week AUM growth and achieved a 40% increase in retention rate. i.e. 40% of users made a recurring deposit at least once a month through our initiatives.Recognizing the inherent volatility in the DeFi market, we pivoted to build Tasseo.xyz, a platform that bridges the gaps between Artists and their collectors through On-chain membership programs.We are backed by marquee investors: Accel Partners and Better Capital.
experience.description_html: As one of the early team members at Anaglyph, I assumed multiple roles as a Generalist, working closely with the founders. We aimed to simplify the intricacies of DeFi, so we built Brew Money, a self-custody DeFi wallet that helped our users earn higher yields on their crypto assets with interest credited every second.I drove product-led growth and experimented on various insights we received through our user research which resulted in over 10% week-over-week AUM growth and achieved a 40% increase in retention rate. i.e. 40% of users made a recurring deposit at least once a month through our initiatives.Recognizing the inherent volatility in the DeFi market, we pivoted to build Tasseo.xyz, a platform that bridges the gaps between Artists and their collectors through On-chain membership programs.We are backed by marquee investors: Accel Partners and Better Capital.

experience.title: Contributor
experience.description: Safary is a curated network of the top growth leaders in web3. Members exchange insights and work together to reverse-engineer web3 growth tactics.- As part of Cohort 3, I collaborated with the Founders to scale growth and contributed to the community.- I created a Web3 Growth Toolbox and developed a Growth Playbook to assist the community.- I assisted other cohort members in launching Web3 products on Product Hunt and Smoothie.
experience.description_html: Safary is a curated network of the top growth leaders in web3. Members exchange insights and work together to reverse-engineer web3 growth tactics.- As part of Cohort 3, I collaborated with the Founders to scale growth and contributed to the community.- I created a Web3 Growth Toolbox and developed a Growth Playbook to assist the community.- I assisted other cohort members in launching Web3 products on Product Hunt and Smoothie. <!---->

positions.subtitle: Facebook
positions.description: Facebook Developer Circles are community-driven groups that bring together local developers to collaborate, share knowledge, and learn new skills. These circles are part of Facebook's broader effort to support and engage with the developer community worldwide.- Worked as part of the international team, managing the developer community. Developed key performance indicators (KPIs) for the Developer Circles India team strategy, impacting over 40,000 developers across India.- Scaled the community threefold to over 6,500 members and facilitated contributions to the Facebook Open-Source Immersion, resulting in over 120 open-source contributions.- Led the Spark AR program, which resulted in over 100 published augmented reality (AR) filters and enhanced the community's skills in AR development.
positions.title: Core Team, Lead - Developer Circles
positions.description_html:
Facebook Developer Circles are community-driven groups that bring together local developers to collaborate, share knowledge, and learn new skills. These circles are part of Facebook's broader effort to support and engage with the developer community worldwide.

- Worked as part of the international team, managing the developer community. Developed key performance indicators (KPIs) for the Developer Circles India team strategy, impacting over 40,000 developers across India.
- Scaled the community threefold to over 6,500 members and facilitated contributions to the Facebook Open-Source Immersion, resulting in over 120 open-source contributions.
- Led the Spark AR program, which resulted in over 100 published augmented reality (AR) filters and enhanced the community's skills in AR development.

positions.subtitle: Facebook
positions.description: I was selected as a competitive international applicant to attend the Facebook Analytics Academy 2020. The Facebook Data Engineering Team mentored us.Our Team, Scooby Data Doo analysed Facebook User Datasets and found unique insights for a given problem statement. We analyzed the datasets using Excel, Python, NumPy, Pandas, and SQL technologies.
positions.title: Facebook Analytics Academy 2020
positions.description_html:
I was selected as a competitive international applicant to attend the Facebook Analytics Academy 2020. The Facebook Data Engineering Team mentored us.

Our Team, Scooby Data Doo analysed Facebook User Datasets and found unique insights for a given problem statement. We analyzed the datasets using Excel, Python, NumPy, Pandas, and SQL technologies.

experience.title: GitHub Field Day India
experience.description: I was selected to attend the GitHub Field Day India hosted by GitHub Education. Field Day is an unconference for leaders who are actively involved in improving their local technical community.
experience.description_html: I was selected to attend the GitHub Field Day India hosted by GitHub Education. Field Day is an unconference for leaders who are actively involved in improving their local technical community. <!---->

experience.title: Product Intern
experience.description: - Built an analytics dashboard and tracked success metrics to evaluate feature performance using Excel & Metabase.- Assisted with app notifications using Firebase, conducting rigorous A/B testing across multiple parameters (timeframes, products, and cohorts).- Designed an efficient data model using Python to identify repeat customers.- Recognized as a Rockstar Intern for prompt execution and exceptional ability to work in cross-functional teams.

education.title: Osmania University
education.description: Activities and Societies: Student Finance Manager- Organizing Committee for IEEE Student Branch, Quiz Organizer Osmania University is named after its founder, Nawab Osman Ali Khan, the seventh Nizam of Hyderabad brought the University into existence in 1918. Osmania University, is the seventh oldest in India, the third oldest in south India and the first to be established in the erstwhile princely state of Hyderabad.
education.description_html: Activities and Societies: Student Finance Manager- Organizing Committee for IEEE Student Branch, Quiz Organizer
